description:
Our New Haven team at Papcsy Janosov Roche is eager to work with accused, injured and divorcing parties in Connecticut. Our law office has spent 20 years helping our clients secure the case outcomes they seek. While there is no guarantee we will win your case, our track record suggests that we will have a high likelihood of doing so. This is especially true in personal injury law, where we have won several multimillion-dollar cases for our clients. Although our goal is always to reach an acceptable settlement without heading to trial, we are unafraid to go to battle with big insurance companies and aggressive litigators.

The Team at Our Law Office

Our team includes administrative staff and four award-winning attorneys serving at multiple offices. Here are some interesting facts about our attorneys:

• Donald Papcsy: He is an award-winning trial attorney who has won millions of dollars for his clients.
• Devin Janosov: As a former member of prosecution teams, he now uses that experience to fight for his clients' innocence.
• David Roche: He is an award-winning attorney with an educational background in criminal law and political science.
• Angela Papcsy: She is an experienced family law attorney who can handle both amicable and high-conflict divorces.

The Reputation We Built at Papcsy Janosov Roche

We are five-start attorneys delivering five-star results. Our law office receives 90% of our clients as referrals from former clients, professionals in the field and other law firms. This is a testament to the fact that we put our clients first and do everything we can to advocate for their best interests.
